QuestData.Title: Ticker Required
QuestData.Description: Our best demo-man, Ticker, is on assignment with the Gob Squad. He's got WAY more than enough explosives for all the runestones in the ruins.$B$BAll you have to do is get him there and keep him covered - he'll handle the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Ticker into the ruins and cover him as he sets up bombs at 3 of the Spitelash Runestones.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ticker's a man after my own heart. Couldn't be prouder.
QuestData.RewardText: The hope is that that cuts off a major source of their magic. The truth is, we don't really have a clue. Who can pass up an opportunity to blow some stuff up though.
